ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Ghoul Assassin Advice?
ygData.msgSnippet: Wait! I know what it was Sylly!  It s the evil Verant anit-camp code.  The AI figured out we were really there for the belt and the dirk (we all already had
ygData.messageBody:
Wait! I know what it was Sylly! It's the evil Verant anit-camp code. The
AI figured out we were really there for the belt and the dirk (we all
already had the bag and me and the rogue already had the masL) and thus just
wanted to tease and frustrate us further!! :)

Taneran
----- Original Message -----
From: Jeff Illian <jeff@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, March 15, 2000 2:13 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Ghoul Assassin Advice?


> From: "Jeff Illian" <jeff@...>
>
> hmmm, we always got masks from the assassins and bags from the suppliers,
> never nada loots. Weird.
>
> Taneran
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>
> To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
> Sent: Wednesday, March 15, 2000 2:07 PM
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Ghoul Assassin Advice?
>
>
> > From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>
> >
> > Just going from rough memory, I think I camped the room for a good 2
hours
> > before I got my guise (not mask - heh). In that time we got place
holders
> > and or nada loots from the named. Something is on the 34 min cycle but
it
> > wont always be the Assassin with a mask or dirk.
> >
> > Sylly
> >
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Jeff Illian [mailto:jeff@...]
> > Sent: Wednesday, March 15, 2000 1:51 PM
> > To: eqbards@onelist.com
> > Subject: Re: [eqbards] Ghoul Assassin Advice?
> >
> > From: "Jeff Illian" <jeff@...>
> >
> > Did they change the spawn on the assassin and supplier?
> > Last time I was
> > there it was 34 minutes. We had a stretch where we got 4
> > assassins (all
> > with the mask :( ), and 5 suppliers ( all with the bag :( )
> > in a row...
> > That was maybe 3 months ago, so maybe they changed the spawn
> > times in there
> > since...
> >
> >
